title: Multiply by the Conjugate
text: Multiply the numerator and denominator by the congugate of the denominator $$4-\sqrt{2}$$
speech: Multiply the numerator and denominator by the congugate of the denominator , 4 minus the square root of 2

title: Simplify
text: Simplify the denominator as much as possible

title: Remove common factors
text: Remove the common factors of the numerator and denominator by dividing them out.
